name: Artsy Geek

description:
We work with inspiring ideas and the brilliant people behind them. Our specialty is integrated marketing and fabulous creative both on and offline.
Our services build on our in-depth expertise and experience in branding, website development, social media and internet marketing.Â 
Whether you're looking at rebranding, revamping your website or embarking on an internet marketing campaign, look to us to make it a fun, innovative and wildly successful project.
